sets.name: The First Chapter
sets.description: The inaugural set of Disney Lorcana featuring beloved Disney characters reimagined as magical ink.

sets.name: Rise of the Floodborn
sets.description: The second set introducing Floodborn characters and new gameplay mechanics.

sets.name: Into the Inklands
sets.description: Journey deeper into the magical realm with new characters and locations.

sets.name: Ursula's Return
sets.description: The sea witch returns with powerful new allies and treacherous schemes.

sets.name: Shimmering Skies
sets.description: Soar through magical skies with flying characters and aerial adventures.

sets.name: Azurite Sea
sets.description: Dive into the depths of the mystical Azurite Sea and its underwater wonders.

sets.name: Fabled
sets.description: Legendary tales come to life in this special collection.

sets.name: Archazia's Island
sets.description: Embark on an adventure to the mysterious Archazia's Island.

sets.name: Reign of Jafar
sets.description: The villainous sorcerer's rise to power brings darkness to the realm.
